name: D. Eytan / R. Lahav-Rigg Architects Reviews

review.employee-type: Project Manager and Interior Designer (Former Employee)
review.title: “A "Green Architecture" office with a family-like atmosphere”
review.pros: Pros – A good reputation, very patient , nice and knowledgeable bosses that have amazing stories to share, homely environment, convenient location with lovely surroundings. I felt a very good connection with the entire staff, and the boss's personal assistant is absolutely adorable.
review.cons: Cons – The office is demanding availability to various public contests and tenders. Sometimes the work can be challenging and even difficult. At times, I found it rather hard to balance between my personal life and my professional one.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I worked directly under the upper management, and therefor find this question inappropriate.
